ViewDef.Title: Report: Distributed Port Groups for CSV export
ViewDef.Description:
A simple table for export as a CSV file. Used in report only, hence it has no formatting. Just like the rest of the report, it is designed for weekly, not daily nor monthly.
Schedule it to run end of the week, such as Sunday 23:59

Property.name: displayName
Property.value: Reclaimable Disk Space from Powered Off VM

ReportDef.Title: VOA - Inventory
ReportDef.Description:
This report is part of VCF Optimization Assessment. It's not a standalone report. Use it together with the other VOA reports and Inventory suite of dashboards.
It's designed for a VCF Consultant to explain and walkthrough with customers, as part of health review. It's not a DIY report to be read on a regular basis and compare with previous run.
To see for the whole environment, run this against vSphere World object. To see specific vCenter or vCenter Data Center, choose the object.
Tailor this report to highlight items that need attention. One way to do is by applying filters on relevant widgets. Filter out up to date settings, or only show outdated versions.

ReportDef.Title: VOA - vSphere Clusters CSV Export
ReportDef.Description:
This CSV file is part of VCF Optimization Assessment. It's not a standalone file. Use it together with the other CSV export as each file only covers 1 object.
It's designed for further analysis in a spreadsheet.
To see for the whole environment, run this against vSphere World object. To see specific vCenter or vCenter Data Center, choose the object.
Tailor this large view by removing unnecessary columns.
